pages.text: An imperfect ritual that clears the weather and stops rain or thunderstorms. This ritual brings clear skies for approximately 5 minutes.$(br2)$(bold)Setup:$()$(br)Place a Lapis Block on top of an Imperfect Ritual Stone.$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$() 1000 LP per use$(br2)$(bold)Note:$() The ritual has no persistent effect - it activates once and completes immediately. The stone can be reused.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$()$(br)1. Right-click the Imperfect Ritual Stone$(br)2. The weather clears instantly$(br)3. Rain and thunder stop$(br)4. Clear skies last ~5 minutes$(br)5. The stone remains for reuse$(br2)$(bold)Applications:$()$(li)Stop rain during important tasks$(li)Clear thunderstorms for safety$(li)Prepare for outdoor work$(br2)$(italic)Command the very heavens.$()
